scripts.clean: rimraf dist reports reports/html reports/screenshots reports/videos reports/cucumber-report.json reports/junit.xml allure-results allure-report
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test:ci: npm run clean && cucumber-js --config cucumber.js --format json:./reports/cucumber-report.json --format @cucumber/junit-xml-formatter:./reports/junit.xml
scripts.test:ai: npx rimraf allure-results && cucumber-js --config cucumber.js --format allure-cucumberjs/reporter
scripts.test:ai:tag: npx rimraf allure-results && cucumber-js --config cucumber.js --format allure-cucumberjs/reporter --tags "%TAGS%"
scripts.test:ci:allure: npm run clean && cucumber-js --config cucumber.js --format allure-cucumberjs/reporter --format json:./reports/cucumber-report.json --format @cucumber/junit-xml-formatter:./reports/junit.xml
scripts.allure:report: npx allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && npx allure open allure-report
